scripts.deploy:kovan:reset: npm run truffle:deploy:kovan:reset && npm run export-data
scripts.deploy:local: TEST_ENV=local npm run truffle:deploy:local && npm run export-data
scripts.deploy:local:reset: TEST_ENV=local npm run truffle:deploy:local:reset && npm run export-data
scripts.deploy:local:tokens: TEST_ENV=local npm run truffle:deploy:local:tokens && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.deploy:local:tokens:reset: TEST_ENV=local npm run truffle:deploy:local:tokens:reset && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.deploy:staging:tokens: npm run truffle:deploy:staging:tokens && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses:staging && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.deploy:staging:tokens:reset: npm run truffle:deploy:staging:tokens:reset && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses:staging && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.export-data: npm run export-data:scripts && npm run prettier:write:exported-data && npm run prettier:write:natspec-docs
scripts.mint-tokens: npm run truffle:exec:mint-bdsla && npm run truffle:exec:mint-dai
scripts.test:local:bdsla: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=local npm run truffle:test:local test/bdsla.test.js
scripts.test:local:messenger: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=local npm run test:local test/messenger.test.js
scripts.test:local:slaRegistry: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=local npm run truffle:test:local test/slaRegistry.test.js
scripts.test:local:sla: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=local npm run truffle:test:local test/sla.test.js
scripts.test:staging:bdsla: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=staging npm run truffle:test:staging test/bdsla.test.js
scripts.test:staging:messenger: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=staging npm run truffle:test:staging test/messenger.test.js
scripts.test:staging:sla: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=staging npm run truffle:test:staging test/sla.test.js
scripts.test:staging:slaRegistry: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=staging npm run truffle:test:staging test/slaRegistry.test.js
scripts.export-data:scripts: npm run truffle:compile && npm run truffle:exec:export-abis && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses && npm run truffle:exec:create-natspec-docs
